meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>private</radical> <radical>bow</radical> made of <radical>insect</radical>s that's extremely <kanji>strong</kanji>. Insect bodies are really durable, so they make for strong bows. You also have to be strong to use it, since it was made just for strong arms.
readingMnemonic: You had this <kanji>strong</kanji> bow made especially for you in <reading>きょう</reading>と. きょうと is famous for their strong bows, so if you ever want another, you know where to go.
